title: No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
description: When scripting a data set, there are no objects under the 'Context' section in the palette.
OB: When attempting to script a data set, I can't find any objects under the 'Context' section in the palette.
EB: I expected that when scripting a data set, objects under the 'Context' section in the palette would be available. Specifically, the 'BeforeOpen' object should be present as well. However, there is nothing under the 'Context' section.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software and navigate to the 'Script Data Set' feature.
2. In the 'Palette' on the right-hand side, select the 'Context' section.
3. Observe that there are no objects listed under the 'Context' section.
